name: PushPriceList
description: A service that allows to manage the entirety of a price list.

properties.name: ActiveForOrganizationUnits
properties.description: The organization units that use this pricelist. If left empty will leave the current configuration unchanged. If specified, will replace the current configuration.

properties.name: Components
properties.description: The list of components that make up the pricelist. If left empty this will leave the current configuration unchanged. If specified only the components present will be modified. Components must be explictly deleted.

properties.name: CurrencyID
properties.description: The currency for the pricelist. Must be present for the creation of a pricelist but can be left empty in subsequent calls.

properties.name: ID
properties.description: The unique identifier for this pricelist.

properties.name: IsActive
properties.description: Whether or not the pricelist is active.

properties.name: LowProductCountOption
properties.description:
The PushPriceList service is optimized for updating a pricelist in its entirety, so for many products at once when using a PriceEntry component. When using few products or even single products this service can perform unnecessary work. It's always recommended to
use this service in a large batch manner but if that's not possible you can specify your intent by using either LowProductCountOption = Auto or Optimize. Effectively this service will simply store the new price entries and return.
The updated prices won't become effective until the next calculation round, which happens every 15 minutes. The threshold for 'low product count' is set at 100 products.

properties.name: Name
properties.description: The name of the pricelist. Must be present for the creation of a pricelist but can be left empty in subsequent calls.

properties.name: RecalculateEffectivePrices
properties.description:
Whether or not to immediately recalculate the effective prices after processing the changes. Otherwise, the prices are automatically recalculated every 15 minutes. Until such a recalculation has been performed, the old price will remain active.
Defaults to false, only specify as true if you cannot wait for the normal recalculation cycle.

properties.name: SpecifiedPricesIncludeTax
properties.description:
If set to true then all prices specified on this price list will be interpreted as already VAT-included. If set to false then all prices will be interpreted as VAT-excluded. If not specified then the default value is true.

So if a price entry of 90 EUR is added to this pricelist with SpecifiedPricesIncludeTax = true (or not specified) then the price will be interpreted as 90 EUR already including VAT.
If SpecifiedPricesIncludeTax = false then the price will be interpreted as 90 EUR excluding VAT so that will be added on top for any orders created with this price.

properties.name: SystemID
properties.description:
A string that identifies the system that was used to call this service. In combination with the ID of the pricelist, this is what uniquely identifies the pricelist in EVA.
The SystemID must be the same for every call, if it's different from a previous call then a new pricelist will be created.

properties.name: TimeZone
properties.description: The timezone that will be used to interpret activation times for prices.

properties.name: WaitForCompletion
properties.description: If specified as true, the call to PushPriceList will not return until all uploaded prices have been stored and all prices have been recalculated. Normally this process runs in the background.
